citation: Proclamation under the Building and Construction (Regulatory Reform Amendments) Act 2020 (Tas)
text:
Proclamation under the Building and Construction (Regulatory Reform Amendments) Act 2020

I, the Governor in and over the State of Tasmania and its Dependencies in the Commonwealth of Australia, acting with the advice of the Executive Council, by this my proclamation made under section 2 of the Building and Construction (Regulatory Reform Amendments) Act 2020 fix 30 November 2020 as the day on which the provisions of that Act commence.

19 November 2020

C. WARNER

Governor

By Her Excellency's Command,

MICHAEL DARREL JOSEPH FERGUSON

Minister for State Growth

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 25 November 2020

This proclamation is administered in the Department of State Growth.
